text: Jake Wightman (born 11 July 1994) is a British middle-distance runner competing primarily in the 1500 metres. He won the gold medal at the 2013 European Junior Championships. In June 2018, Whightman set the Scottish Record for 1000m with a time of 2:16.27 at the Diamond League event in Stockholm breaking the previous record which had stood since 1984. ==Personal life== His father-coach, Geoff Wightman, and mother, Susan Tooby, were both marathon runners.2016 EAC bio Jake has a twin brother, Sam (who sometimes appeared as the British Athletics mascot, Britbear) and a sister, Martha.
